PassFort | Fullstack Developer | London, UK | Onsite | Full-time | £50-£80K depending on experience + equity

At PassFort, our vision is to solve trust in the digital economy, by redefining how people and businesses build relationships online. Starting with regulated institutions - we are building the infrastructure required to link the human concept of trust with the transformative technology of the internet.

We work with an awesome stack - Javascript (ES6), React, Redux front end; Python, Rust back end; microservice based architecture built on top of Kubernetes and Google’s Cloud Platform.

Team - We're 12 people strong, have solid funding behind us, and looking to double over the next year mainly investing in our product team.

Values - Trust, Empowerment, Growth!
